rev.desc.rev.desc: Roll back previous modification, and modified below panels to align with the new requirement
Modified panel decide.overall.action to set udmdb.id as NULL when removing CI from ucmdb.
Story ucmdb reconciliation rule enhancement to directly read ddmreconcile table, set ucmdb.id as default reconcile rule
Story ucmdb reconciliation rule enhancement to directly read ddmreconcile table
the logical name can't be changed due to the display name story
if the exit panel is decide.init.ddmRule, the $L.rule.sql will be empty, so get.rules.1 will execute true query.
change the exit panel to prepare.rule.lookup work fine, the relateship could be create normally.
query:logical.name="+logical.name in $L.file+" and ucmdb.id=NULL and type="+type in $L.file+" //query:
query:logical.name="+$L.id.escape+" and ucmdb.id=NULL and type="+type in $L.file+" //query:
2. Then, check the ucmdb.id by decision panel
9.31 testing found add relationship directly can't trigger history log.
Change the condition to handle the cirelationship unplanned/validation process. The core function are done in javascript.
QCCR1E73701 A uCMDB expression that is defined in extaccess is executed twice.
Review By Qi, Qing-Song, cleanup variable $extaccess in panel:start in case the express execute twice
fix quote issue, simply remove it from logical.name to avoid query syntax issue
fix istatus can't get old value issue
decide.overall.action avoid to use $L.mode which may impact the call.engine
avoid delete can't create change for it's $L.elng=0 always. (will not change any attribute)
change the query rule limit on the same ci type
set the orig file when it use createonly
add the defalut value set during ci update/add
$L.expression="var incident = vars.$L_incident; var id=vars.$L_id; var exceptionFields=vars.$L_exception_field;"
$L.expression+="var oldValues=vars.$L_exception_old; var newValues=vars.$L_exception_new; var action=vars.$L_action; var foreignId = vars.$L_foreignId;"
add unique name for update records. (the old one will change wrong ci record
changed the condition for exit: set.invalid.data
Added new panel: set.invalid.data.del in process type with statements:
66941 [CI Deletion Enhancement] CI record is removed directly although "Update record to status" option is selected for to be deleted record.
QCCR1E68428 Updated to Open: "meaningless SQL statements consume 70% DB time when sync CI from uCMDB to SM
remove useless tagquery for it always null and this cause the performance issue
if ($L.related="deleteByStatus" and $L.action="*SOAP*delete" and $L.filename~="cirelationship") then ($L.action="*SOAP*save";istatus in $L.file=deleteStatus in $L.rule)
if ($L.related="addSetDep" and $L.action="*SOAP*add" and $L.filename="cirelationship") then (outage.dependency in $L.file=true;outage.threshold in $L.file=1)
if ($L.action="delete" and filename($L.file)~="cirelationship") then ($L.invalidDel=jscall("discoveryEvent.invalidDelCall", filename($L.file), type in $L.file.update))

for $L.i = 1 to lng($L.fields) do ($L.field.name=$L.i in $L.fields;$L.index=index("[", $L.field.name);if ($L.index>0) then ($L.field.name=substr($L.field.name, 1, $L.index - 1));$L.statement=$L.field.name+" in $L.file.update="+$L.field.name+" in $L.file";$L.void=evaluate(parse($L.statement, 11)))

for $L.i = 1 to lng($L.fields) do ($L.field.name=$L.i in $L.fields;$L.index=index("[", $L.field.name);if ($L.index>0) then ($L.struct.name=substr($L.field.name, 1, $L.index - 1);$L.field.name=substr($L.field.name, $L.index+1, lng($L.field.name) - $L.index - 1);$L.length=max(lng($L.field.name in $L.file), lng($L.field.name in $L.file.update));$L.statement="for(var i=0; i<"+$L.length+"; i++) { system.vars.$L_file_update['"+$L.struct.name+"'][i]['"+$L.field.name+"'] = system.vars.$L_file['"+$L.struct.name+"'][i]['"+$L.field.name+"'] }";js($L.statement)) else ($L.statement=$L.field.name+" in $L.file.update="+$L.field.name+" in $L.file";$L.void=evaluate(parse($L.statement, 11))))
for $L.i = 1 to $L.exp.lng do (if (not null($L.i in expressions in $L.extaccess)) then ($L.void=evaluate($L.i in expressions in $L.extaccess)))

if ($L.action="add") then for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull($L.fields)) do ($L.field=$L.i in $L.fields;if (not same($L.field in $L.orig.file, $L.field in $L.old) or index($L.field, $L.active.fields)>0) then ($L.x=lng(denull($L.exception.field))+1;$L.x in $L.exception.field=$L.field;$L.x in $L.exception.old=$L.field in $L.old;$L.x in $L.exception.new=$L.field in $L.orig.file)) else for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(rules in $L.rule)) do ($L.field=1 in $L.i in rules in $L.rule;$L.cond=nullsub(2 in $L.i in rules in $L.rule, true);if (evaluate($L.cond) and (not same($L.field in $L.orig.file, $L.field in $L.old) or index($L.field, $L.active.fields)>0)) then ($L.x=lng(denull($L.exception.field))+1;$L.x in $L.exception.field=$L.field;$L.x in $L.exception.old=$L.field in $L.old;$L.x in $L.exception.new=$L.field in $L.orig.file))

if ($L.action="add") then for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull($L.fields)) do ($L.field=$L.i in $L.fields;$L.index=index("[", $L.field);if ($L.index>0) then ($L.tmpindex=$L.index;while ($L.tmpindex>0) do ($L.index=$L.tmpindex+1;$L.tmpindex=index("[", $L.field, $L.index));$L.field=substr($L.field, $L.index, lng($L.field) - $L.index));if (not same($L.field in $L.orig.file, $L.field in $L.old) or index($L.field, $L.active.fields)>0) then ($L.x=lng(denull($L.exception.field))+1;if (index($L.field, fieldName in $L.rule)>0) then ($L.x in $L.exception.field=$L.field) else ($L.x in $L.exception.field=$L.i in $L.fields);$L.x in $L.exception.old=str($L.field in $L.old);$L.x in $L.exception.new=str($L.field in $L.orig.file))) else for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(rules in $L.rule)) do ($L.field=1 in $L.i in rules in $L.rule;$L.cond=nullsub(2 in $L.i in rules in $L.rule, true);if (evaluate($L.cond) and (not same($L.field in $L.orig.file, $L.field in $L.old) or index($L.field, $L.active.fields)>0)) then ($L.x=lng(denull($L.exception.field))+1;$L.x in $L.exception.field=$L.field;$L.x in $L.exception.old=str($L.field in $L.old);$L.x in $L.exception.new=str($L.field in $L.orig.file)))
changed exit if no records selected by query from init.reconcile to decide.get.file.copy.again
created new decision panel with name: decide.get.file.copy.again
added exit get.file.copy.again with codition nullsub($L.from.ucmdb, false) and not null(logical.name in $L.file)
create new select panel with name: get.file.copy.again
exit if no records selected by query: init.reconcile
exit if one records selected by query: create.update.copy

for $L.i = 1 to lng($L.fields) do ($L.field.name=$L.i in $L.fields;$L.index=index("[", $L.field.name);if ($L.index>0) then ($L.field.name=substr($L.field.name, 1, $L.index - 1));$L.statement=$L.field.name+" in $L.file.update="+$L.field.name+" in $L.file";$L.void=evaluate(parse($L.statement, 11)))

new panel: set.invalid.data in process type

for $L.i = 1 to $L.lng do ($L.field=1 in $L.i in rules in $L.rule;$L.cond=nullsub(2 in $L.i in rules in $L.rule, true);if (evaluate($L.cond) and (not same($L.field in $L.orig.file, $L.field in $L.old) or index($L.field, $L.active.fields)>0)) then ($L.x=lng(denull($L.exception.field))+1;$L.x in $L.exception.field=$L.field;$L.x in $L.exception.old=$L.field in $L.old;$L.x in $L.exception.new=$L.field in $L.orig.file))

Panel: create.update.copy, change exits normal from duplicate.copy to decide.merge
Add panel, type: decision, name: decide.merge
exit: merge.record, condition for exit: lng($L.fields)>0
New panel, type: process, name: merge.record

for $L.i = 1 to lng($L.fields) do ($L.field.name=$L.i in $L.fields;$L.index=index("[", $L.field.name);if ($L.index>0) then ($L.tmpindex=$L.index;while ($L.tmpindex>0) do ($L.index=$L.tmpindex+1;$L.tmpindex=index("[", $L.field.name, $L.index));$L.field.name=substr($L.field.name, $L.index, lng($L.field.name) - $L.index));$L.statement=$L.field.name+" in $L.file.update="+$L.field.name+" in $L.file";$L.void=evaluate(parse($L.statement, 11)))
on panel decide call engine added another exit.normal condition
added a line so that when no excption found, do not create another change or incident since one already exist
added the following line in panel prepare.rule.lookup
if (filename($L.orig.file)="cirelationship" and $L.action="delete") then for $L.i = 1 to lng(related.cis in $L.orig.file) do ($L.i in related.cis in $L.orig.file="")
QC48741 - Modified the 'set.add' panel to include the following expression:
This will prevent the 'Affected CI' field for all incidents and changes created for UCMDB relationships from being set to <relationship.name>;<logical.name>.
on panel set.reconsile.sql, add the line at the end to make sure reconciliation rule only applies to CI from same company in multi-tenant integration.
Set the company field in dataModEvent when replicating CIs from ucmdb for multi tenant.
Modified set.event.fields and setup the company field. added:
on panel start.loop, save ucmdb.id first and set it to $L.file at the end. On panel set.recouncile.rule.sql, add ucmdb.id=NULL at the end of the sql
on setup.change, add $L.file when calling script populateChange
Added the following line to the panel 'setup.incident' in order to set the field to true when the incident is created via ucmdb discovery:
on panel setup.incident, pass in $L.file when calling javascript popualteIncident
add if ($L.action="add") then ($L.action="ignore") to set.incident.id os that we will not attempt to add the ci when the rule says to open incident.
convert company from id to company code which will be used as part of unique key for query replciated ci.

This will prevent the 'Affected CI' field for all incidents and changes created for UCMDB relationships from being set to <relationship.name>;<logical.name>.

Modified set.event.fields and setup the company field. added:
on panel start.loop, save ucmdb.id first and set it to $L.file at the end. On panel set.recouncile.rule.sql, add ucmdb.id=NULL at the end of the sql
